{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Philips |model=Zigbee IP Bridge |revision=1.0 |upc=046677458478 |ean=046677455286 |asin=B016H0QZ7I |price=60 |fcc_date=08/31/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=US, EMEA |type=home automation switch |fcc_id=EW780-8913-00 |ic_id=1135B-80891300 |pwr_v=5.0 |pwr_amp=0.6 |cpu1_brand=STMicro |cpu1_model=STM32F217VE |cpu1_cspeed=120 |fla1=512 KiB |ram1=1 MiB |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=CC2530 |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model=CC2590 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=ZigBee |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_ports=1 |lan_speed=100M |flags=ZigBee |addl_chips=ZigBee SoC;Texas Instruments;CC2530;;1; ,,, ZigBee FEM;Texas Instruments;CC2590;;1; |stock_os=FreeRTOS |802dot11_protocols=ZigBee }} {{TagLine|Hue Personal Wireless Lighting}} :[https://www.usa.philips.com/c-p/046677458478/hue-bridge Product page] (2.0) {{â€¢}} [https://www.usa.philips.com/c-p/046677458478/hue-bridge/specifications Spec.]
Ethernet-controlled ''Lighting controller'' and ''ZigBee bridge'', :part of the ''Philips Hue'' system.
*[[TI]] [http://www.ti.com/product/cc2530 CC2530] @48MHz (ARM Cortex-M3) SoC :2.4GHz 802.15.4, [[ZigBee]] and RF4CE applications.
===See also=== *[[Philips Hue Bridge 2.0]] - ZigBee, Alexa AVS support
